verses.text: \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*:

\w Speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*: \w This|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*:

\w Any|strong="H0376"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* whosoever \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w if|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w kill|strong="H7819"\w* \w an|strong="H0376"\w* \w ox|strong="H7794"\w*, \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w a|strong="H0176"\w* \w sheep|strong="H3775"\w*, \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w a|strong="H0176"\w* \w goat|strong="H5795"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*, \w or|strong="H0176"\w* without \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*,

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w at|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w door|strong="H6607"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* \w an|strong="H7126"\w* oblation \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* guilty \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*: \w as|strong="H0935"\w* \w if|strong="H0376"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w shed|strong="H8210"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, \w so|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w perish|strong="H3772"\w* \w from|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* victims, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* kill \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* sanctified \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w door|strong="H6607"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* testimony, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w peace|strong="H8002"\w* \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* pour \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w door|strong="H6607"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* testimony, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w burn|strong="H6999"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w fat|strong="H2459"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* sweet odour \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w And|strong="H5769"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w more|strong="H5750"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* victims \w to|strong="H1961"\w* devils, \w with|strong="H2077"\w* \w whom|strong="H0834"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w committed|strong="H1961"\w* fornication. \w It|strong="H1961"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w an|strong="H1961"\w* \w ordinance|strong="H2708"\w* \w for|strong="H3808"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w* \w and|strong="H5769"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* posterity.

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* thou shalt \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*: \w The|strong="H0559"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w strangers|strong="H1616"\w* \w who|strong="H0834"\w* sojourn \w among|strong="H8432"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* offereth \w a|strong="H0176"\w* holocaust \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w a|strong="H0176"\w* victim,

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* bringeth \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w door|strong="H6607"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* testimony, \w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w may|strong="H0376"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* offered \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w perish|strong="H3772"\w* \w from|strong="H0935"\w* \w among|strong="H0413"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

\w If|strong="H0834"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* whosoever \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w strangers|strong="H1616"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* sojourn \w among|strong="H8432"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*, \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w set|strong="H5414"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w against|strong="H4480"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w cut|strong="H3772"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w off|strong="H3772"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*:

\w Because|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w* \w of|strong="H4196"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*: \w and|strong="H4196"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w have|strong="H0589"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w may|strong="H5414"\w* \w make|strong="H5414"\w* \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w souls|strong="H5315"\w*, \w and|strong="H4196"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w may|strong="H5414"\w* \w be|strong="H5315"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w an|strong="H5414"\w* expiation \w of|strong="H4196"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w I|strong="H3651"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: \w No|strong="H3808"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w strangers|strong="H1616"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* sojourn \w among|strong="H8432"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w*, \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*.

\w Any|strong="H4480"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* whosoever \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w strangers|strong="H1616"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* sojourn \w among|strong="H8432"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w*, \w if|strong="H0834"\w* \w by|strong="H3478"\w* hunting \w or|strong="H0176"\w* fowling, \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w take|strong="H3680"\w* \w a|strong="H0176"\w* wild \w beast|strong="H2416"\w* \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w a|strong="H0176"\w* \w bird|strong="H5775"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* lawful \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*, let \w him|strong="H0853"\w* \w pour|strong="H8210"\w* \w out|strong="H4480"\w* \w its|strong="H0853"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w cover|strong="H3680"\w* \w it|strong="H0398"\w* \w with|strong="H0376"\w* \w earth|strong="H6083"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*: \w therefore|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \w at|strong="H3478"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* whosoever eateth \w it|strong="H1931"\w*, \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w cut|strong="H3772"\w* \w off|strong="H3772"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* eateth \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w died|strong="H5038"\w* \w of|strong="H4325"\w* itself, \w or|strong="H5704"\w* \w has|strong="H0834"\w* \w been|strong="H2930"\w* caught \w by|strong="H3605"\w* \w a|strong="H0834"\w* beast, whether \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w be|strong="H5315"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w own|strong="H5315"\w* country \w or|strong="H5704"\w* \w a|strong="H0834"\w* \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w*, \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* \w wash|strong="H3526"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w clothes|strong="H0899"\w* \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w himself|strong="H5315"\w* \w with|strong="H3605"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* \w be|strong="H5315"\w* \w defiled|strong="H2930"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w evening|strong="H6153"\w*: \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w in|strong="H7364"\w* \w this|strong="H0834"\w* manner \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* \w be|strong="H5315"\w* \w made|strong="H2930"\w* \w clean|strong="H2891"\w*.

\w But|strong="H0518"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w he|strong="H0518"\w* \w do|strong="H0518"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w wash|strong="H3526"\w* \w his|strong="H3526"\w* clothes, \w and|strong="H1320"\w* \w his|strong="H3526"\w* \w body|strong="H1320"\w*, \w he|strong="H0518"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* \w his|strong="H3526"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*.
